pos: nouns which may take the genitive case particle 'no'

related.meaning: kindergarten (in Japan, non-compulsory education from age 3 until primary school)

lessons.japanese: 園芸がここ数年、流行しています。
lessons.english: Gardening has been popular for some years.

lessons.english: My father taught me the nuts and bolts of gardening.
